part2.templateComment: Only SlotIndex and PartName is required, the rest of the values are optional. defaults are - scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, rotation: -90, offsetX: 0, offsetY: 0
part2.templateComment2: colorChoices must have the same length for each partConfig, otherwise it will not be added.
part2.templateComment3: Each partConfig is named after the image file without the extension. part2.png = part2
part2.templateComment4: Image file is optional, if you do not have one, you can override slot colors by adding partConfigs, like color_leg_left
part2.templateComment5: To get the slot index and names, enable DumpFollowerSpineAtlas in InfernoDragon0.cotl.CustomSpineLoader.cfg file.

color_leg_left.templateComment: This is an example of an override without image file. It will only override the color.
